tool_description: Researches and analyzes hashtag performance, popularity, and relevance to generate strategic hashtag recommendations for content optimization.

seed_keywords.description: Base keywords to generate hashtag suggestions from

platform.description: Target platform for hashtag research (instagram, tiktok, twitter, linkedin)

competition_level.description: Preferred competition level (low, medium, high, mixed)

hashtag_count.description: Number of hashtag suggestions to return (5-50)

niche.description: Content niche for targeted hashtag research

error_messages: Empty keywords array: Provide at least one seed keyword.
Too many keywords: Maximum 10 seed keywords allowed.
Unsupported platform: Use one of [instagram, tiktok, twitter, linkedin].
Invalid competition level: Use one of [low, medium, high, mixed].
Invalid hashtag count: Must be between 5 and 50.
Keywords too generic: Provide more specific seed keywords for better results.
usage: Provide seed_keywords array and platform, optionally specify competition_level, hashtag_count, and niche. Returns curated hashtag suggestions with performance metrics.

recommended_hashtags.description: List of recommended hashtags with # symbols

usage_volumes.description: Usage volume numbers for each recommended hashtag

difficulty_scores.description: Competition difficulty scores (0-100) for each hashtag

trending_status.description: Whether each hashtag is currently trending
